item.title: Kling AI
item.description:
What is Kling AI?

A video generation platform from Kuaishou (Chinese tech company). Text-to-video and image-to-video with quality that rivals Runway. Known for longer clip generation (up to 10 seconds in high quality) and more affordable pricing.

Who is it for?

  • Best for: Content creators who need AI video clips but find Runway too expensive
  • Not for: People concerned about data privacy with Chinese tech companies
  • Solo builder score: ⭐⭐⭐⭐☆ (4/5)

What does it cost?

Plan Price What You Get
Free $0 Daily credits, limited features
Standard $5/mo More credits, faster generation
Pro $30/mo Priority access, highest quality

Hidden costs: Credit system can be opaque. Read the fine print on what counts as one “generation.”
